list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: one of a set of toothed wheels that work together to alter the relation between the speed of a driving mechanism (such as the engine of a vehicle or the crank of a bicycle) and the speed of the driven parts (the wheels).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a racing bike with ten-speed gears
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một chiếc xe đạp đua với bánh răng mười tốc độ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: equipment that is used for a particular purpose.
prepare, adjust, or equip for a particular purpose or need.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they gear workouts to your specific needs
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Họ chuẩn bị tập luyện theo nhu cầu cụ thể của bạn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: design or adjust the gears in a machine to give a specified speed or power output.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: it's geared too high for serious off-road use
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nó hướng quá cao để sử dụng off-road nghiêm trọng
